home.title: Welcome to Sportify
home.subtitle: Discover your sports potential with AI-powered pose analysis
home.description: Sportify uses advanced machine learning to analyze your movement patterns and recommend the best sports for your natural abilities. Get personalized insights and discover opportunities to pursue your athletic dreams.

features.title: How It Works
features.recordActivityDesc: Upload a video or record one using your device camera to capture your athletic movements.
features.aiAnalysisDesc: Advanced AI analyzes your movement patterns using pose detection to measure agility, balance, coordination, and reaction time.
features.getRecommendationsDesc: Receive personalized sport recommendations based on your analysis and discover opportunities that match your profile.
features.poseDesc: Advanced AI analyzes your movement using MediaPipe and TensorFlow.js
features.scoringDesc: Comprehensive scoring across agility, balance, coordination, and reaction time
features.recommendationsDesc: Get personalized sport recommendations based on your analysis
features.opportunitiesDesc: Discover local and national sports opportunities that match your profile

cta.heading: Ready to discover your potential?
cta.description: Upload a video or record one to get started with your analysis

videoInput.title: Record or Upload Video
videoInput.subtitle: Choose how you want to provide your movement video
videoInput.noVideo: Please record or upload a video first

analysis.title: Analyzing Your Movement
analysis.subtitle: Processing video frames with AI...
analysis.pleaseWait: Please wait while we analyze your video

opportunities.title: Sports Opportunities
opportunities.subtitle: Discover opportunities that match your profile
opportunities.noOpportunities: No opportunities found matching your criteria

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Sportify is an AI-powered sports talent analysis platform that helps athletes discover their potential and find opportunities.
